Package geometries

package geometries
  • Classes
    Class
    Description
    Cylinder
    Cylinder class represents a cylinder in 3D space.
    CylinderTest
    Unit tests for Cylinder class.
    Geometry
    An abstract class representing a geometric object in 3D space.
    Plane
    Represents a plane in 3D space defined by a point and a normal vector.
    PlaneTest
    Unit tests for Plane class.
    Polygon
    Polygon class represents two-dimensional polygon in 3D Cartesian coordinate system.
    PolygonTests
    Testing Polygons
    RadialGeometry
    An abstract class that represents geometries with a radial dimension, such as spheres, cylinders, etc.
    Sphere
    Represents a sphere geometry, which is a type of radial geometry defined by a center point and a radius.
    SphereTest
    Test method for Sphere.getNormal(primitives.Point).
    Triangle
    Represents a triangle geometry, which is a type of polygon defined by three points.
    TriangleTest
    Unit tests for Triangle class.
    Tube
    Represents a tube geometry, which is a type of radial geometry defined by an axis (a Ray) and a radius.
    TubeTest
